name: Catching
description: Attempt to live or drop catch every ball that comes to the flippers.

name: Nudging
description: Try to return the ball to a specific flipper with only nudging.

name: Ball Control
description: Only allowed to make shots from a ball that is controlled/cradled.

name: Passing
description: Transfer the ball using a post pass if cradled, or perform a ski pass if the ball is rolling.

name: Accuracy
description: Make a specific shot 5 times in a row, then move to the next shot.
